.. _release/release_notes:

*************
Release Notes
*************

.. release:: 3.6.3
    :date: 2018-06-20

    .. change:: fix
        :tags: Legacy API

        Enforce check for SSL verification in hub connection.


.. release:: 3.6.2
    :date: 2017-06-20

    .. change:: fix
        :tags: Legacy API

        Ignore broken websocket versions in setup.py.


.. release:: 3.6.1
    :date: 2017-06-16

    .. change:: fix
        :tags: Legacy API

        Convert the ftrack module to a py_module for legacy compatibility.


.. release:: 3.6.0

    .. change:: new
        :tags: Legacy API

        The api is now available through this standalone package as opposed
        to packaged together with the ftrack server.
